data.actual_result: Usernames & Timestamps don't wrap in Pinned Messages, Search, & Recent Mentions
data.expected_result: Usernames & Timestamps should wrap to prevent either from going out of view
data.short_description: Usernames & Timestamps don't wrap correctly in Pinned Messages, Search, & Recent Mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server and send a message in a chat - Set a long nickname (just use 32 "w"s for ease of reproducing) - Search for from: {you} and observe
